data_findings.finding: Stacking ensemble approach: Use 5 base models (RandomForest, ExtraTrees, AdaBoost, GradientBoosting, SVM) with out-of-fold predictions as features for second-level XGBoost model
Key feature engineering: Extract Title from Name (Mr, Miss, Mrs, Master, Rare), create FamilySize=SibSp+Parch+1, create IsAlone flag, create Has_Cabin binary, Name_length, bin Age and Fare
Title extraction regex: ' ([A-Za-z]+)\.' - Replace rare titles (Lady, Countess, Capt, Col, Don, Dr, Major, Rev, Sir, Jonkheer, Dona) with 'Rare', Mlle/Ms to Miss
Missing value handling: Age fill with median (or use Title-based median), Embarked fill with mode, Cabin mostly missing - use Has_Cabin binary
Sex is strongest predictor: Female 74.2% survival vs Male 18.9%. Pclass also important: 1st=63%, 2nd=47%, 3rd=24%. Embarked C=55%, Q=39%, S=34%
